instruction: Which condition is asociated with RS80358152?
output:
Hereditary breast and ovarian cancer syndrome (HBOC), caused by a germline mutation 
in BRCA1 or BRCA2, is characterized by an increased risk for breast cancer, ovarian cancer, prostate cancer, and pancreatic 
cancer. The lifetime risk for these cancers in individuals with a mutation in BRCA1 or BRCA2: 40%-80% for breast cancer. 11%-40% 
for ovarian cancer. 1%-10% for male breast cancer. Up to 39% for prostate cancer. 1%-7% for pancreatic cancer. Individuals with 
BRCA2 mutations may also be at an increased risk for melanoma. Prognosis for BRCA1/2-related cancer depends on the stage at which 
the cancer is diagnosed; however, studies on survival have revealed conflicting results for individuals with germline BRCA1 or 
BRCA2 mutations when compared to controls. The associated SNPedia page is https://www.snpedia.com/index.php/Rs80358152. The NCBI page is https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/snp/80358152.

instruction: In which chromosome is located the RS80358152 SNP?
output: It is located in the chromosome 17
